produce.title: SELECT A RESOURCE TO PRODUCE IN THIS FACTORY

double.name: COLONIZE TWICE
double.description:
ALLOWS YOU TO COLONIZE 
TWO TIMES PER TURN.

recycle.name: RECYCLING
recycle.description:
ALLOWS YOU TO RECOVER 
60% (FROM 40%) OF THE 
RESOURCES WHEN DEMOLISHING 
A BUILDING.

local.name: EXPANDED STORAGE
local.description:
EXPANDS THE CAPACITY 
OF LOCAL WAREHOUSE FROM 
10 to 20 MATERIALS.

maps.name: TACTICAL MAPS
maps.description:
GRANTS YOUR UNITS 
AN EXTRA MOVEMENT POINT.

warehouse.name: WAREHOUSE
warehouse.description:
ALLOWS YOU TO STORE
MORE MATERIALS AND BUILD
MORE EXPENSIVE BUILDS.

factory.name: FACTORY
factory.description:
ALLOWS YOU TO PRODUCE
AMMUNITION AND ARMORS
FOR YOUR UNITS.

parliament.name: PARLIAMENT
parliament.description:
ALLOWS YOU TO PURCHASE
AND USE UPGRADES.
